bill.summary: Nicholas and Zachary Burt Memorial Carbon Monoxide Poisoning Prevention Act of 2019 This bill directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to award grants to states and tribal organizations to install carbon monoxide alarms in (1) the homes of low-income families and older adults, (2) facilities that commonly serve children or older adults, and (3) student-housing units at public universities. Such carbon monoxide alarms must comply with specified standards.
